## MapView.clearElevationSource() method

Clears any elevation sources and provider previously set.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearElevationSource(elevationSource: DataSource): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elevationSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The datasource to be cleared. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
